snippet: At least 33 people were killed and many others were wounded by airstrikes at an outdoor market in Aleppo just a day after an airstrike on an elementary school killed 20.
abstract: Syrian government airstrikes in Aleppo, Syria, kill at least 33 people and wound many others; attack comes day after an airstrike on elementary school killed at least 20 people, including 17 children.

byline.original: By RICK GLADSTONE and HWAIDA SAAD
byline.contributor: Rick Gladstone reported from New York, and Hwaida Saad from Beirut, Lebanon.

lead_paragraph: At least 33 people were killed and many others were wounded by airstrikes at an outdoor market in Aleppo just a day after an airstrike on an elementary school killed 20.

headline.main: Dozens Are Killed in Airstrike at a Bustling Market in Syria
headline.print_headline: Dozens Are Killed in Airstrike at a Bustling Market in Syria
